component.name: Mooer Looper Manager
component.summary: Manage tracks on Mooer GL100/GL200 looper pedals

description.p: Mooer Looper Manager is a utility to manage your looper tracks on Mooer GL100 and GL200 pedals. It allows you to export tracks as WAV files and import new tracks into the device.
To access the device, install udev rules by running:

sudo sh -c 'echo "SUBSYSTEM==\"usb\", ATTRS{idVendor}==\"34db\", ATTRS{idProduct}==\"0008\", MODE=\"0666\", TAG+=\"uaccess\"" > /etc/udev/rules.d/99-mooer-looper.rules' && sudo udevadm control --reload-rules
